TEI.2.document_title: S Sawyer to Stephen F Austin, 08-01-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with S. Sawyer, August 1, 1831. Bill.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 685

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with S. Sawyer, August 1, 1831. Bill.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Austin*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="08-01-1831">1st August, 1831*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*Bought of*person_mentioned* S. Sawyer*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*1 Bedsted Matrass etc____________________@ $80.00*/p*
*p*By 1 Mule___________________________ 40.0*/p*0
*p*Balance due__________________________$40.00*/p*
*/div1*
